quaternion Class Reference
[Mathematical support classes]

#include <quaternion.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Quaternion of scalar type float.

NOTE: The class behaves like C basic types what it comes to initialization so default constructor leaves the components to unspecified value. Alerting user is the reason also for that the name starts with lower-case letter.


Public Types

enum  { SIZE = 4 }

quaternion quaternion::squad ( float  t,
const quaternion &  a,
const quaternion &  b,
const quaternion &  q 
) const

Returns spherical cubic interpolation for unit quaternions.

This quaternion is used as element [n-1] in the interpolation.

Parameters:
t Interpolation phase [0,1]
a quaternion [n]
b quaternion [n+1]
q quaternion [n+2]
